S:log-item.D:comment: DERBY-2258 DERBY-2259 DERBY-2260 DERBY-2245 1) metadata.properties : Removed entries for LONG NVARCHAR, NATIONAL CHAR, NATIONAL CHAR VARYING data type & added XML data type in getTypeInfo() 2) DatabaseMetaDataTest.java : Removed check for unsupported types (all supported types are specified in supportedTypes array ) from testGetTypeInfo() method & added support for SQLXML type in the test. This requires extending the test to verify the field values for XML data type (like PRECISION, SEARCHABLE etc) 3) connectionJdbc20.out : It requires removing unsupported data types & adding XML data type in the expected output for the test. 4) Minor changes to getSQLKeywords. Patch contributed by: Saurabh Vyas Saurabh.Vyas@Sun.COM
